Download

Using a build tool

JSP implementation

  • Maven
  • Gradle
  • Grails
  • Ivy
  • Grape
  • Buildr
  • SBT
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.github.dandelion</groupId>
    <artifactId>datatables-jsp</artifactId>
    <version>0.9.0</version>
</dependency>

'com.github.dandelion:datatables-jsp:0.9.0'

<dependency org="com.github.dandelion" name="datatables-jsp" rev="0.9.0" />

@Grapes( 
   @Grab(group='com.github.dandelion', module='datatables-jsp', version='0.9.0') 
)

'com.github.dandelion:datatables-jsp:jar:0.9.0'

libraryDependencies += "com.github.dandelion" % "datatables-jsp" % "0.9.0"

compile 'com.github.dandelion:datatables-jsp:0.9.0'

Thymeleaf implementation

  • Maven
  • Gradle
  • Grails
  • Ivy
  • Grape
  • Buildr
  • SBT
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.github.dandelion</groupId>
    <artifactId>datatables-thymeleaf</artifactId>
    <version>0.9.0</version>
</dependency>

'com.github.dandelion:datatables-thymeleaf:0.9.0'

<dependency org="com.github.dandelion" name="datatables-thymeleaf" rev="0.9.0" />

@Grapes( 
   @Grab(group='com.github.dandelion', module='datatables-thymeleaf', version='0.9.0') 
)

'com.github.dandelion:datatables-thymeleaf:jar:0.9.0'

libraryDependencies += "com.github.dandelion" % "datatables-thymeleaf" % "0.9.0"

compile 'com.github.dandelion:datatables-thymeleaf:0.9.0'

Manually

Core and dependencies

  • datatables-core
  • slf4j-api 1.6.4
  • Commons Beanutils 1.8.3
  • JSON Simple 1.1.1

JSP implementation

  • datatables-jsp

Thymeleaf implementation

  • datatables-thymeleaf

Extras

Servlet 2
  • datatables-servlet2
Spring 3
  • datatables-spring3
Export POI (XLS)
  • datatables-export-poi
Export POI OOXML (XLSX)
  • datatables-export-poi-ooxml
Export iText (PDF)
  • datatables-export-itext
